author: PlayStation
description:
https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/10014113

Out now on PlayStation 5!

Anima Gate of Memories I&II Remaster brings together two acclaimed action RPGs in one enhanced game!
Explore a rich fantasy universe inspired by the Anima Beyond Fantasy tabletop RPG saga, filled with deep lore, fast-paced combat, and branching storylines shaped by your choices.

#ps5 #ps5games #AnimaRemaster
title: Anima Gate of Memories I&II Remaster - Launch Trailer | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://www.playstation.com/en-us/games/my-hero-academia-alls-justice/

The city, the people, helping upstanding citizens in trouble; every moment makes you a hero.

Dive into everything that awaits you in MY HERO ACADEMIA: All's Justice in this game mode overview!

MY HERO ACADEMIA: All’s Justice releases on February 6th, 2026 – available on PlayStation 5!

Pre-order now to receive early access to two playable characters: [Link]

The MY HERO ACADEMIA: All’s Justice Deluxe Edition includes the base game and the Season Pass – including 5 additional playable characters to be released post-launch.

The Ultimate Edition includes the base game, the Season Pass, 20 additional costumes, and 7 HUD banners

#ps5 #ps5games #myheroacademia
title: My Hero Academia: All’s Justice - Game Modes Trailer | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://store.playstation.com/concept/10005976

"I think the conversations, the script, the way it's written just feels really grounded and a bit dangerous at times as well. And I love that unpredictability, which is part of the reason why I'm playing the original. I'm loving it." 

Join the team at Alkimia Interactive for an exclusive behind-the-scenes look at the Gothic 1 Remake, as we dive deep into the process of bringing the iconic dark and gritty atmosphere of the Colony to life with our English localization team.

Actors:
1. Adam Diggle - Ur-Shak, Various characters
2. Joseph May - Nameless Hero
3. Harry Myers - Xardas, Various characters
4. Andres Williams - Diego
5. Emma Gregory - UrNazkrog, Velaya

Directors:
1. Beth Park - Lead Voice Director
2. Daniel Bainbridge - Voice Director

Localization made by PitStop Productions
 
#ps5 #ps5games #Gothic #ReturnToTheColony
title: Gothic 1 Remake - Making Of Special: English Voice Over | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://store.playstation.com/concept/10013420

In Bee Simulator: The Hive, you'll get to live the epic adventure of a tiny bee in a vast world! Collect pollen, race through jet streams, and protect your hive from wasps. Now even bigger with The Hive expansion - gather resources, build and customize your very own beehive!

Coming to PS4 and PS5 on November 28th, 2025

#ps5 #ps5games #ps4 #ps4games #beesimulator
title: Bee Simulator: The Hive - Release Date Trailer | PS5 & PS4 Games

Wherever you go, I will always be by your side. No matter what the sacrifice, I’ll protect you with my life.

This is Lou MagMell.  
Bound By Blood – CODE VEIN II releases January 30th, 2026.
